{{Lang|'''Yumemizuki Mizuki'''{{Name Order|Japanese}}|ja=夢見月瑞希|ja_rm={{Not a typo|Yumemidzuki Mizuki}}}} is a playable {{Anemo}} [[character]] in ''[[Genshin Impact]]''.

She is a renowned clinical psychologist in [[Inazuma]]. After returning from [[Natlan]], she became the core founding investor and major shareholder of [[Aisa Bathhouse]]. As a [[yumekui-baku]], she has the ability to devour her patients' nightmares, helping them to improve their mental health.
